description:
SocketSniff allows you to watch the Windows Sockets (WinSock) activity of the selected process.

For each created socket, the following information is displayed: socket handle, socket type, local and remote addresses, local and remote ports, total number of send/receive bytes, and more.

You can also watch the content of each send or receive call, in Ascii mode or as Hex Dump.
author: Nir Sofer
